One of the biggest mistakes people generally make,...
...and I'm guilty of it, too, is wishful thinking.
You know, you want something to be true even if it isn't true.
And so you ignore the things that, you ignore the real truth...
...because of what you want to be true.
This is a very difficult trap to avoid.
And like I said, it's certainly one that I find myself in, having problems with.
But if you just take that approach of, you're always to some degree wrong,...
...and your goal is to be less wrong.
